comment.author: 35128489@N07
comment._content: Many thanks Peterfd, this is very helpful indeed.  Some of the photographs have notes on them that have obviously been made some time after they were taken, in this case mistakenly.  One of the objects of the project is to gather more information about them, so thanks again.  The caption has been changed accordingly.  We will also check the details on the other picture that you mention.
